de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.message.handler.simple

Class DefaultTnccHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.message.handler.simple.DefaultTnccHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TnccHandler, TnccsHandler, TnccsMessageHandler

    public class DefaultTnccHandler
extends Object
implements TnccHandler
    Default handler to handle messages destined to/from a TNCC.
